EmailTemplate.name: TKD_Submited for Tollgate 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" has changed its stage to Tollgate 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} stage has been changed to Tollgate 1 and is waiting for Approval.
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engen Capital.
